info.info1: Currently I'm working as a web developer at Liana Technologies. I have been working with web development for over ten years. My work demands technical and organizational skills. At the same time it requires creative problem solving skills and capability to work in group-setting as the work involves a lot of communication between different people. All this makes my work pleasant and interesting on a daily basis.
info.info2: As a contrast to my job, I use my free time to help elderly people. I also like to move around in the nature. I also engage to any kind of crafts from furniture restoration to cooking.
info.info3: You can learn anything, as long as you possess passion, motivation, and good teacher.

filters.filtersocial: Show only social area related content

knowledge.info1: Designing, building and testing responsive website, webshops and graphical newsletters
knowledge.info3: Communicating with people with memory related disorders & diseases
knowledge.info4: Home service (Cleaning, windows cleaning, cooking, raking, grass and shrub cutting)
